sentence.Network_en: Unimmunized contacts, especially infants, should receive 2 to 4 ml. of hyperimmue gamma globulin intramuscularly.
sentence.Network_cn: 未经免疫的接触者, 尤其是婴儿, 应接受2～4毫升高度免疫性的丙种球蛋白肌肉注射.

sentence.Network_en: Unimmunized contacts, especially infants, should receive 2 to 4 ml. of gamma globulin intramuscularly.
sentence.Network_cn: 未经免疫的接触者, 尤其是婴儿, 应接受2～4毫升高度免疫性的丙种球蛋白肌肉打针.

sentence.Network_en: The toxic reactions of intramuscularly administered polymycin B are closely related to larger doses.
sentence.Network_cn: 多链霉素B肌肉注射时的毒性反应与其剂量较大是密切有关的.
